name: Infinightmare
description:
Team's Name:
Astra

Game Description:
Infinightmare is a 2D top-down strategy and survival game where you control inanimate objects to help the main character to beat the cursed dungeon.
Help Sakura beat the dungeon, and you will finally be free...

Gameplay Controls:
- Mouse 1 : Hold and Release Object
- ESC : Cheat Code Break Free
- Alt + Tab : Pause

Team's Member & Role:
- Muhammad Rafliadi (Leader, Game Programmer)
- Muhammad Asfian (Game Designer, Game Programmer)
- Ibnu Yudha Raul Pratama Yunaz (Art Director, Environment Artist)
- Taufik Setyawan (Environment Artist, Character Artist)

=========================================================
